quoted.text:
We are revising our developer API policies: 

We will no longer allow apps that reward users for posting on X (aka â€œinfofiâ€). This has led to a tremendous amount of AI slop & reply spam on the platform.

We have revoked API access from these apps, so your X experience should start improving soon (once the bots realize theyâ€™re not getting paid anymore).

If your developer account was terminated, please reach out and we will assist in transitioning your business to Threads and Bluesky.

tweets.text:
RT @NanoBanana: Have you tried prompting with the word "risograph"? It makes a cool effect.

Prompt: Create a collection of icons representâ€¦

retweet.text:
Have you tried prompting with the word "risograph"? It makes a cool effect.

Prompt: Create a collection of icons representing [a theme], they belong together as a single theme. Put them in a 2x2 grid (no lines). The background is pure white. Make the icons as risograph prints. No text. No color distortion. Vibrant and not faded. Stochastic stippling and sand-like noise pattern within color fills. Each icon has a thick black outline.

The theme in this image was "cute but weird animals (that are real)".

quoted.text:
Prompt: Create a collection of icons representing [a theme], they belong together as a single theme. Put them in a 3x3 grid. The background is white. Make the icons in a colorful and tactile 3D style. No text.

- dogs with different emotions
- bananas
- January
- the same cat in different emotions
